description: Redevelopment of buildings at the rear to provide new building for Buisness Use rising to basement  lower ground and seven storeys at the rear along with refurbishment of 199-203 St John Street (former gin warehouse) and the retention and refurbishment of 187-191 (with additional floor) and retention of facade of 195 and erection of small infill building on remainder of St John Street frontage. Total floorspace 17 750 sqm.Main difference with current proposal (to that refused) relates to refurbishment (instead of demolition) of 187-191 and retention of facade of 195. PROPOSED PLANS: 833/A/1/B-833/A/6/B 833/B/1/E-833/B/9/E. THIS IS A DUPLICATE APPLICATION.
decision_conditions: APPLICANT HAS APPEALED AGAINST NON DETERMINATION 20.07.90. APPEAL WITHDRAWN 10.06.91.
